mapper.select: select * from app_revision where data_center = #{dataCenter} and id > #{afterId} order by id limit #{limit}
mapper.insert: delete from app_revision where data_center=#{dataCenter} and revision=#{revision}; insert into app_revision ( data_center, revision, app_name, client_version, base_params, service_params, service_params_large, deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) values ( #{dataCenter}, #{revision}, #{appName}, #{clientVersion}, #{baseParams}, #{serviceParams}, #{serviceParamsLarge}, #{deleted}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ) on duplicate key update deleted = #{deleted};
mapper.select: select * from app_revision where data_center=#{dataCenter} and gmt_modified < #{beforeTime} and deleted='0' limit #{limit}
mapper.delete: delete from app_revision where data_center=#{dataCenter} and gmt_modified < #{beforeTime} and deleted='1' limit #{limit}
